haxegui

haxegui.managers.MouseManager

type
class
extends
flash.events.EventDispatcher
available in
flash9
Mouse Manager Class

Injects mouse position to fake cursor, leaving the real one free to drag.

Static Variables

_instance : MouseManager
automated : Bool
moving : Bool
stage : flash.display.Stage
